The Power of Plants

Moving to a plant-based diet doesn‚Äôt mean sacrificing protein. In fact, many plant sources are packed with essential amino acids.

1. Lentils

Lentils are a nutritional powerhouse. They are rich in:

  • Protein
  • Fiber
  • Iron

Tip: Soak lentils overnight to reduce cooking time and improve digestibility.

2. Quinoa

Unlike most plant proteins, quinoa is a complete protein, meaning it contains all nine essential amino acids.

Did you know?

Quinoa is actually a seed, not a grain!

Summary

Incorporating these foods into your diet can lead to better health outcomes and sustained energy levels.
